description: The ID of this Google Search Twitter module tweet.
name: id

description: The ID of the Google Search instance to which this Twitter module tweet belongs.
name: base_id

description: The list index of the Twitter module tweet.
name: list_index

description: The type (row or column) of Twitter tweet (mobile only).
name: type

description: The stripped HTML of the Twitter module tweet.
name: stripped_html_HTML

description: The URLs obtained from the 'stripped_html_HTML' field.
name: stripped_html_source_urls

description: The images (as Base64 strings or URLs) obtained from the 'stripped_html_HTML' field.
name: stripped_html_media_thumbnail_urls

description: The time at which this tweet was published.
name: time_of_publication

description: The source URL of this tweet.
name: source_url
